metadata.title: CVE-2024-3447 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer overflow was found in the SDHCI device emulation ofQEMU. The bug is triggered when both `s->data_count` and the size of`s->fifo_buffer` are set to 0x200, leading to an out-of-bound access. Amalicious guest could use this flaw to crash the QEMU process on the host,resulting in a denial of service condition.

criterions.comment: qemu package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
